data.oai_dc:dc: Compressed folder with Fasta files containing SNPs for each clade

The attached zipped folder is comprised of two Fasta files, each containing the SNPs identified in the ticks from Clade A and Clade B respectively. In order to have been called, the SNPs had to be present in at least 20% of individuals.
tick|genomic|single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs)|host movement|genotyping by sequencing (GBS)
